text: 23:5 Mat 6:1; Aniwa 6:8; Masing 15:38 Aduga makhoina touba thabak khudingmak misingna unanaba tou-i. Makhoina Mapugi Puyagi aiba wahei haptuna sijinnaba sawunna semba upu adu pak-halli aduga makhoigi phigi phinasing adu cholhalli23:5 Jehudisingna Ishwor amadi mahakki waheibu nungsiba utnabagidamak Ishworgi wahei happa sawungi uppu sinei aduga phidagi yantharakpa phina adu cholhannei..
